pr_title: Fix NPE in generic connection init path

timeline.body:
I think we should not set a default properties mapping here but check those options at connection level.
Can you take a look at https://github.com/eclipse-vertx/vertx-sql-client/pull/636?

If you're fine with that, you could merge it and rebase.
timeline.bodyText:
I think we should not set a default properties mapping here but check those options at connection level.
Can you take a look at #636?
If you're fine with that, you could merge it and rebase.
